content: Consolidated financial margin in the clients grew 27%, boosted by higher volumes, especially on credit in Chile as well as higher interest rates, which positively impact the margins in liabilities and capital. I think there are two main moving parts on this discussion that need more information about the size of the monetary policy impact, and we are seeing the timing of the length of it, but I'm pretty sure that the NPL's will be going higher on the next few quarters.
